thread.title: Matt Le Nevez and Brendan Cowell hit Bathurst ahead of Peter Brock biopic
thread.title_full: Matt Le Nevez and Brendan Cowell hit Bathurst ahead of Peter Brock biopic | DailyTelegraph

author: Jonathon Moran
title: Matt Le Nevez and Brendan Cowell hit Bathurst ahead of Peter Brock biopic
text:
WHAT better way for Matt Le Nevez to get in the headspace of playing late great motor racing champ Peter Brock than to spend a weekend at Bathurst?
Le Nevez, 36, and fellow actor Brendan Cowell, who will play Allan Moffatt, did just that last weekend ahead of starting filming of Ten’s much anticipated telemovie, Brock.
“The opportunity for me to go up there the week before we start rehearsals was just inspiring,” Le Nevez told Confidential.
“It was to get a feeling of the energy behind that event (the Bathurst 1000) and if you’re playing Peter Brock, you’ve got to go to Bathurst, it is a once in a lifetime opportunity. I went up the mountain and watched some of the race. Bathurst is the mecca for car racing so for me to experience that while people are racing there, we were very fortunate.”
Brock was killed in Perth in 2006 when he lost control of his car in the Targa West Rally and hit a tree. He was aged 61.
Drivers Peter Brock (R) & Allan Moffatt in 1986 Motor Racing P/ Also in the cast are Ella Scott Lynch as his wife, Bev, Natalie Bassingthwaighte as Julie Bamford and Steve Bisley as Harry Firth. Production will begin next week with Brock set to air on Ten next year.

Opinion 0 comments Robert Irwin’s animal instinct Celebrity The telemovie will focus on all aspects of his life, both professional and personal.
“Like anyone, if you’re telling a story of someone’s life, from their 20s to the tragic accident when he was 61, I think there are going to be contradictions and flaws,” Le Nevez explained. “Many of them (flaws) have been aired in public and that is sort of unfortunate for the family I am sure but we are not there to destroy Brocky’s legacy, we are there to introduce it to a whole new generation of people so we will be telling the great story of Peter Brock. There are many aspects and facets to him as a person and we hope to really introduce this legend and this awesome man to a whole new generation of people.”
In terms of physical transformations, Le Nevez has had to slim down.
“Peter was a very health conscious and lean man,” he said. “I’ve been in LA trying to strip down a few kilos and stay out of the gym.”
